column2: A letter has arrived from Castle Black, the Lord Commander has confirmed that a large wildling host marches towards the Wall under the banner of a new King-beyond-the-Wall, he pleads you to host an army and help squash this threat...
This is clearly not my problem to deal with...
Grant command of a fort along the Wall to a capable, or, trustworthy man...
It's time a new commander takes charge of a fortification along the Wall, strengthening your grip along it's length...
Brother [From.GetFirstName] shall command the Shadow Tower!
It's time a new commander takes charge of a fortification along the Wall, strengthening your grip along it's length...
[This.GetTitledFirstName] has dishonored himself in the eyes of both Gods and men, perhaps, a chance at redemption serving as a Black Brother of the Night's Watch would be a more dignified end...
This is not a small matter, one which you will have to personally take part in, making sure the travel expenses of your prisoner are paid once the Watch recruiter comes...
This man has been given the responsibility of coordinating all ranging beyond-the-Wall, maintaining a constant watch on the threats mounting on the far North...

The order of the Stewards leader makes sure his men in charge of day-to-day operations at the Wall are performing their duties as ordered specially the preservation of the crucial roads linking the Watch forts together...
The First Builder has to work day and night in keeping the forts near the Wall in shape...
At the Wall it's commander is elected from the Night's Watch numbers, each brother casts a single vote in favor of his preferred candidate.
Has taken a woman as wife
This brother of the Night's Watch has been selected to take up a spot in the order of the Rangers...
This brother of the Night's Watch has been selected to take up a spot in the order of the Builders...
This brother of the Night's Watch has been selected to take up a spot in the order of the Stewards...
